page.title: 20Recreation and Entertainment
page.content: The Norfolk Broads and the rivers which join them offer excellent facilities for a wide variety of water-based activities from sailing to angling bird-watching.Great efforts are being made in such areas as Ranworth to improve these facilities even more to cater for the thousands of visitors who come to Norfolk and the Broads each year as, well as for local enthusiasts. However recreational pursuits of a less outdoor type appear lacking because of its being a predominantly agricultural area.The nearest cinemas, clubs and dancehalls are in Norwich to the south or in Great Yarmouth to the east.With public transport being very poor,many people without access to a car,feel rather isolated especially in the winter months.
